job description:
Overview:

As Data Science Lead, you are a mathematician and engineer with experience delivering data and event pipelines, building data warehouses for internal metrics, and making massive amounts of data available in real time for a variety of analysis. You've lead small, focused teams related to the above and are used to reporting to a head of data science.

Responsibilities:
  • Lead a team capable of developing and maintaining all internal data science products and servicing the various stakeholders inside BitMEX
  • Provide mentoring and guidance to your junior team members across various data science disciplines
  • Develop and serve real time analytics to Product, Marketing, Business Development, Management, Investment, Risk Management, and Engineering teams
  • Lead data science initiatives, priorities, and delivery
  • Help generate and produce new end user products based on original data science work
Requirements:

  • 3+ years of professional experience, with a proven track record of leading teams
  • An advanced degree in mathematics or statistics, or equivalent experience
  • Experience with AWS services and operating in the cloud generally
  • Experience with Kafka, Kinesis, or NATS a plus
  • Experience moving large amounts of real time data, and making it available to internal analytics tools
  • Experience in finance not required, but a plus
